nodes.text: In the aftermath of the Great Hyperspace Disaster during the High Republic Era, a task force was created by the Galactic Republic in order to discover the cause of the disaster and subsequent Emergences, and find a way to deal with them. Operating largely from the Republic Defense Coalition cruiser Third Horizon, the task force was led by Jedi Master Avar Kriss and included Jedi Knight Elzar Mann, Admiral Pevel Kronara, and Marlowe and Vellis of the San Tekka clan as members.
